components.name: Logo
components.description: Renders the Fitness Tracker logo.
usage: Used in the Header component to display the logo.

components.name: NewButton
components.description: Renders the "New" button, used to trigger goal creation.
usage: Used in the Header component to provide a link to the goal creation page.

components.name: Header
components.description: Renders the application header, including the logo, navigation, and "New" button.
usage: Used in the Layout component to display the header for all pages.

components.name: Footer
components.description: Renders the application footer, containing copyright information and legal links.
usage: Used in the Layout component to display the footer for all pages.

components.name: Sidebar
components.description: Renders the navigation sidebar, displaying links to various app sections.
usage: Used in the Layout component to display the sidebar for all pages.

components.name: Layout
components.description: Defines the main layout structure of the application, including header, sidebar, and footer.
usage: Used by all pages to provide a consistent layout.

components.name: Button
components.description: Renders a generic button with customizable text and styling.
usage: Used throughout the application for button elements.

components.name: Card
components.description: Renders a card component for displaying content in a visually distinct container.
usage: Used throughout the application for displaying content cards.

components.name: Modal
components.description: Renders a modal component for displaying dialogs or pop-ups.
usage: Used throughout the application for displaying modals.

components.name: Input
components.description: Renders a text input field component.
usage: Used throughout the application for user input.

components.name: Select
components.description: Renders a dropdown menu component.
usage: Used throughout the application for dropdown menus.

components.name: Spinner
components.description: Renders a spinner component, typically used to indicate loading states.
usage: Used throughout the application for loading states.

components.name: LoginForm
components.description: Renders the login form for user authentication.
usage: Used on the login page to allow users to log in.

components.name: SignupForm
components.description: Renders the signup form for user registration.
usage: Used on the signup page to allow users to register.

components.name: GoalCard
components.description: Renders a card component to display a single goal.
usage: Used on the Goals page to display individual goals.

components.name: GoalForm
components.description: Renders a form for creating or editing goals.
usage: Used on the Goals page for both creating new goals and editing existing ones.

components.name: GoalList
components.description: Renders a list of goals, using GoalCard components to display them.
usage: Used on the Goals page to display the list of goals for the user.

components.name: ProgressChart
components.description: Renders a chart using Chart.js to visualize progress towards a goal.
usage: Used on the Progress page to display charts showing progress data for goals.

components.name: ProgressLog
components.description: Displays a list of progress entries for a goal, showing dates, progress values, and timestamps.
usage: Used on the Progress page to display a detailed log of progress entries for a goal.

components.name: DashboardStats
components.description: Renders key dashboard metrics, such as overall progress, active goals, and recent activity.
usage: Used on the Dashboard page to display a summary of the user's fitness progress.

components.name: RecentActivity
components.description: Displays a list of recent user activities (e.g., exercise, sleep).
usage: Used on the Dashboard page to show the user's recent activity.

components.name: CommunityFeed
components.description: Renders the community feed, displaying recent user activity and allowing for interactions.
usage: Used on the Community page to display the social feed of user activities.

components.name: UserProfile
components.description: Renders a user's profile, displaying information and potentially allowing for interactions.
usage: Used on the Community page to display user profiles.

components.name: LandingPage
components.description: Renders the main content for the landing page.
usage: Used as the main content for the root page of the application.
